content: the double_crochet 2 row below * repeat until the end - 110 *half_double_crochet in the next 10 sts increase* repeat until the end - 120 green in the 3rd loop double_crochet around - 120 *single_crochet in the next 2 sts increase* - 160 white *double_crochet in the next 12 sts bobble in the double_crochet 2 row below double_crochet in the next 2 sts bobble in the double_crochet 2 row below* repeat until the end - 160 green double_crochet around - 160 single_crochet around - 160 double_crochet around - 160 bottom white 1 mc - 6 single_crochet 2 *increase - 12 3 *single_crochet increase* - 18 4 *single_crochet in the next 2 sts increase* - 24 5 *single_crochet in the next 3 sts increase* - 30 6 continue in this pattern until it is as big as the second white section you want it to be smaller than the top so the top can bend down and be more pillow like and not just flat a i got to*single_crochet in the next 25 sts increase* slip_stitch the bottom to the top stuff the turtle when you get about 3/4 of the way stitched leg green 1 chain 24 and join with a slip_stitch to the first chain 2 single_crochet 24 3 single_crochet 24 in the back loop 4 single_crochet 24 in the back loop 5 single_crochet 24 in the back loop 6 single_crochet 24 in the back loop 7 single_crochet 24 in the back loop 8 stuff and while holding the top together to close slip_stitch together cut and weave in end 9 with the red yarn embroider an outline foot shape on the top of each one *make 4 of these legs and attach around the body tail green 1 mc - 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in every stitch 4 3 *single_crochet increase* x 2 - 6 4 single_crochet in every stitch - 6 5 *single_crochet increase* x 3 - 9 6 single_crochet in every stitch - 9 7 *increase single_crochet* x 4 increase - 14 8 single_crochet in every stitch - 14 9 *increase 3 single_crochet* x 3 increase single_crochet - 18 10 single_crochet in every stitch - 18 11 single_crochet in every stitch - 18 12 single_crochet in every stitch - 18 *stuff and cut a tail 24 long and use it to attach tail to the body of the turtle head green row 1 mc - 8sc row 2 increase x 8 - 16 row 3 *increase single_crochet* x 8- 24 row 4 *2 single_crochet increase* x 8 - 32 row 5-10 single_crochet around row 11 *single_crochet 6 decrease* x 8 - 28 row 12 & 13 single_crochet around row 14 *single_crochet 5 decrease* x 8 - 24 row 15 & 16 single_crochet around row 17 *single_crochet 4 decrease* x 8 - 20 row 18 & 19 single_crochet around row 20 *single_crochet 3 decrease* x 8 - 16 row 21-28 single_crochet around stuff and close the round and cut a 24 tail use your tail to sew
